summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Fifteenth Avenue West, from Atlanta Street to Armour Street; Fourteenth Avenue West, from West Howe Street to West Barrett Street; Thirteenth Avenue West, from Atlanta Street to Gilman Avenue; Eleventh Avenue West, from Gilman Avenue to West Howe Street; Gilman Avenue, from Fifteenth Avenue West to Eleventh Avenue West; West Barrett Street, from Fourteenth Avenue West, to Fifteenth Avenue West; Armour Street, from Fifteenth Avenue West to Sixteenth Avenue West; Alva Street, from Fifteenth Avenue West to Thirteenth Avenue West; Atlanta Street, from Fifteenth Avenue West to Thirteenth Avenue West; and Smith Street, from Fifteenth Avenue West to Gilman Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, and constructing such beiges as may be necessary, in accordance with Resolution No. 657 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
